SCN FBMWRingFlameBoltSCRIPT

; Applied to the Flamebolt Ring.

Begin OnEquip Player
	Player.AddSpell fbmwFlameBoltSpell
	SelectPlayerSpell fbmwFlameBoltSpell
End


Begin OnUnequip Player
	Player.RemoveSpell fbmwFlameBoltSpell
End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 6 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
